LanguageData.ElfPenis.label: elf penis
LanguageData.ElfPenis.description: A graceful and slender humanlike penis. Is that glitter?
LanguageData.ElfVagina.label: elf vagina
LanguageData.ElfVagina.description: A tighter humanlike vagina. Tastes like oranges.
LanguageData.ElfAnus.label: elf anus
LanguageData.ElfAnus.description: A tighter humanlike anus. Smells of flowers.
LanguageData.OrcPenis.label: orc penis
LanguageData.OrcPenis.description: A girthy penis with human and equine features mixed in. When erect, the foreskin leaves a ring in the middle, while also exposing the rounded, flat head at the tip. When not in use, it hangs freely.
LanguageData.OrcVagina.label: orc vagina
LanguageData.OrcVagina.description: A loose vagina with human and equine features mixed in. The larger outer labia covers the smaller inner labia, that in turn protects the vaginal opening and the urethra. The clitoris very large and usually pokes out when hard.
LanguageData.OrcBreasts.label: orc breasts
LanguageData.OrcBreasts.description: A pair of humanlike breasts. Being an important part of sexual attraction to humanlikes, they keep their fat and round form even when not breastfeeding. The are heavier and larger than breasts from other humanlikes.
LanguageData.OrcAnus.label: orc anus
LanguageData.OrcAnus.description: A puffy anus, its shaped like a dougnut.
LanguageData.GhoulPenis.label: irradiated penis
LanguageData.GhoulPenis.description: A penis that irradiates heat and light. It has the same average shape as a humanoid penis.
LanguageData.GhoulVagina.label: irradiated vagina
LanguageData.GhoulVagina.description: A vagina that irradiates in the form of heat and light. It has the same average shape and texture as a humanoid vagina.
LanguageData.GhoulBreasts.label: irradiated breasts
LanguageData.GhoulBreasts.description: A pair of humanlike breasts that was bathed in radiation, to the point of glowing in the dark. they're very hot to the touch.
LanguageData.GhoulAnus.label: irradiated anus
LanguageData.GhoulAnus.description: A humanlike anus that was bathed in radiation, to the point of glowing in the dark. It is unconfotably hot inside.
LanguageData.BigRaceBreats.label: breastss
LanguageData.BigRaceBreats.description: just a normal pair of breasts found on larger Humanoids.
